org.springframework.http.server.reactive

Class ReactorServerHttpResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.server.reactive.AbstractServerHttpResponse
      • org.springframework.http.server.reactive.ReactorServerHttpResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpMessage, ReactiveHttpOutputMessage, ServerHttpResponse, ZeroCopyHttpOutputMessage

    public class ReactorServerHttpResponse
extends AbstractServerHttpResponse
implements ZeroCopyHttpOutputMessage
    Adapt ServerHttpResponse to the HttpServerResponse.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini, Rossen Stoyanchev
